snippet: Michael D. Shear reports from Des Moines on the virtual tie in Iowa between Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum as the 2012 campaign moves to New Hampshire and South Carolina.
abstract: Michael D. Shear reports from Des Moines on the virtual tie in Iowa between Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum as the 2012 campaign moves to New Hampshire and South Carolina.

headline.main: Caucus Video: On to New Hampshire
